code: import{useRef,useState}from'react';import Wizard from'@components/wizard';import Address from'./steps/Address';import SocialLinks from'./steps/SocialLinks';import PersonalInfo from'./steps/PersonalInfo';import AccountDetails from'./steps/AccountDetails';import{FileText,User,MapPin,Link}from'react-feather';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WizardModernVertical=()=>{const[stepper,setStepper]=useState(null);const ref=useRef(null);const steps=[{id:'account-details',title:'Account Details',subtitle:'Enter Your Account Details.',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FileText,{size:18}),content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccountDetails,{stepper:stepper,type:"modern-vertical"})},{id:'personal-info',title:'Personal Info',subtitle:'Add Personal Info',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(User,{size:18}),content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PersonalInfo,{stepper:stepper,type:"modern-vertical"})},{id:'step-address',title:'Address',subtitle:'Add Address',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MapPin,{size:18}),content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Address,{stepper:stepper,type:"modern-vertical"})},{id:'social-links',title:'Social Links',subtitle:'Add Social Links',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{size:18}),content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SocialLinks,{stepper:stepper,type:"modern-vertical"})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modern-vertical-wizard",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Wizard,{type:"modern-vertical",ref:ref,steps:steps,options:{linear:false},instance:el=>setStepper(el)})});};export default WizardModernVertical;
